name: Mochiko
description:
The game is very casual. It involves tapping on the screen to make the dog jump to eat food. The dog doesn't like to eat chocolate or veggies. Eating a chocolate and Jalapeno peppers will lead to automatic game over. But other veggies will take away time. The more that Mochiko eats, the more heavy she will be – which means you will need to tap more to jump higher. There is a special food that will increase her weight, but not make her more heavy, it is sushi :)

I recently added a global leaderboard, so you can put your initials if you make it in the top 5.

The game is available on AppStore and Google Play store.

Here's a screenshot of the game: https://imgur.com/a/ZpDumFh
